package.name: IR_Neatly_Reporting
package.summary: View a range of detailed reports about your sales, products and customers from your Neatly dashboard.
package.description:
This extension allows Neatly to pull and generate detailed reports about your sales, customers and products. Simply install the extension and enter your API key and you will be able to view the following data:
  • Sales Overview
  • Sales by Category
  • Top Products
  • Sales by Customer Group
  • Sales by City
  • Sales by Hour
  • Sales by Day
  • New vs Returning Customers
  • Sales by Payment Type
  • Sales by Country
You can also compare data against previous period of custom your date range comparison. You can also create your own dashboard and compare against a wide range of metrics including Google Analytics. Customer Search Filter Want to send targeted emails to a specific group of customers? Use our customer search feature to segment your customers and export as a CSV or export directly to Mailchimp. Search for customers based on:
  • Number of Orders
  • Order Value
  • Product SKU
  • City/Postcode
So if you want to reward your top customers or determine who has shopped with you for a while then this is the tool for you.
package.notes: You can now view total sales by product SKU, category or attribute using the "Product Search" feature.
